answers.answer: Hi menashe, i would request you to provide more information regarding your problem. The details, which will help us to better understand your problem are:1. Your age.2. Any medical problem (like diabetes, increased BP, past herpes infection etc..).3. Presence of any orthopedic problem (arthritis, vertebral disc prolapse etc..).4.History of fall and spinal injury.5.long term immobilization.6.Any other information, which you think is important.7.Long term medication taken for other illness.
